title: Flights ✈️
description: Booking flights efficiently can save you a significant amount of money and hassle. Knowing when to book and which platforms to use is key.
sentences: Booking flights 6-8 weeks in advance usually offers the best prices for domestic travel.
Use flight comparison websites to check prices across multiple airlines.
Be flexible with your travel dates and times to find cheaper fares.
Consider budget airlines for short-haul flights but be mindful of baggage allowances.
Always double-check passenger details before confirming your booking.
dos: Do web check-in to save time at the airport.
Check the baggage allowance for your ticket.
Arrive at the airport well in advance of your flight.
Keep your ID and boarding pass handy.
donts: Don't forget to check for hidden fees like seat selection or convenience charges.
Don't carry prohibited items in your cabin or check-in baggage.
Avoid booking flights with very short layovers.
Don't rely on public Wi-Fi to access your booking details at the last minute.
